@xaleeel there's seeds for pc games because,uh, they are left on the pc. Most people want to play their ps3 games after they dl them but don't have the space/bandwidth for 2 copies (1 on ps3 and 1 on pc). Especially when some games are 40-50GB each. Best bet is just copy rentals (gamefly, movie store,buy used/rip/resell, etc) if you have no patience for torrents or broken links at dl sites and don't want to get a newsgroup acct.
